data.question: Are there any discounts at this time?
data.response: No, there are no discounts at this time. Please check back at a later date.

data.question: Is there a reward program at this time?
data.response: No, there is not a reward program at this time. Please check back at a later date.

data.question: Does ** offer giftcards?
data.response: Yes, gift cards are offered at the location. See front desk.

data.question: How can I check my gift card balance?
data.response: Call or visit our website and click "Gift Card Assistance"

data.question: Will servers sing happy birthday?
data.response: We will accomadate this per request of customers.

data.question: Does ** offer catering?

data.response: Yes, come on down and enjoy drink until 8pm.

data.question: Does ** offer low carb options?
data.response: No, this is our little secret, sorry.
